summary: Completed frontend testing of the Transaction Import feature. All tested features are working correctly: Import button appears on Transactions tab, Import dialog opens, CSV file upload works, column mapping workflow functions properly, transaction preview with checkboxes displays correctly, import confirmation with project/account/category selection works, and imported transactions appear in the list.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed (same as previous iteration)

passed_tests: Frontend: Import button (data-testid='import-transactions-btn') appears on Transactions tab
Frontend: Import dialog opens when clicking Import button
Frontend: Import dialog shows 'Upload your bank statement' with supported formats (CSV, OFX, QFX)
Frontend: CSV file upload works - file name and CSV badge displayed after upload
Frontend: CSV Options section appears with Delimiter dropdown and 'First row is header' checkbox
Frontend: Next button (data-testid='import-next-btn') proceeds to column mapping step
Frontend: Column mapping step shows Date Column, Amount Column, Description Column (Optional), and Date Format dropdowns
Frontend: Detected columns section shows 'date, amount, description' from CSV header
Frontend: Parse button processes CSV and shows preview
Frontend: Preview step shows transaction count (5 transactions) with 'selected for import' count
Frontend: Preview table shows Date, Description, Amount columns with checkboxes for selection
Frontend: Deselect All / Select All button toggles all checkboxes
Frontend: Transaction rows are clickable to toggle selection
Frontend: Continue button shows selected count and proceeds to confirm step
Frontend: Import Settings step shows Project, Account, Default Category dropdowns
Frontend: Summary section shows Transactions count, Total Income, Total Expenses
Frontend: Import button (data-testid='import-confirm-btn') is enabled after selecting all required fields
Frontend: Import completes successfully with 'Successfully imported' message
Frontend: Dialog closes after successful import
Frontend: Imported transactions appear in the transactions list with correct dates, descriptions, and amounts
Frontend: Total Balance updates to reflect imported transactions (3,925.00€ → 5,464.51€)
action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components to fix accessibility warning
critical_code_review_comments: Import feature implementation is well-structured with clear multi-step workflow (upload → mapping → preview → confirm)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
CSV parsing correctly handles date, amount, and description columns
Preview step correctly shows transaction data with checkboxes for selective import
Import settings correctly filter categories by selected project
Summary section provides clear overview of transactions to be imported
EUR currency formatting is consistent throughout the import workflow
Imported transactions correctly appear in the main transactions list after import
seed_data_creation: Imported 5 transactions from /tmp/test_transactions.csv: Grocery store (-45.50€), Freelance payment (+1,500.00€), Electric bill (-89.99€), Gas station (-25.00€), Refund from shop (+200.00€)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Transaction Import feature fully tested and working. The import workflow has 4 steps: 1) Upload file (CSV/OFX/QFX supported), 2) Map columns (CSV only - date, amount, description), 3) Preview transactions with checkboxes, 4) Confirm import with project/account/category selection. Key test IDs: import-transactions-btn, import-file-input, import-next-btn, import-confirm-btn. Test CSV file at /tmp/test_transactions.csv was used for testing. 5 transactions were successfully imported during testing.
